Text: Is it possible to burn this in a clean DVD? thanks

@ harryjohn09, Thats not a problem; what I do is open the XP disc & copy & paste all files into a new folder, then create another folder inside that folder and Title it "PROGRAMS", I put all my programs + Drivers in that folder so everything is on one DVD, then I download N-lite & use it to make a bootable DVD ISO, you can also insert your drivers & hotfixes so they install automatically. This just makes things easy & saves wasting 4 gig of DVD space, hope this helped.

Anacondaz I've just downloaded about 30 of your torrents.
You sir, are a bad ass.
Most up to date collection hands down.
